name: Fragmentum (itch) (Orzing, Popolino)
description:
The year is 3472, almost every act is automated by robots.

In the game you play a robot who used to sort scrap metal pieces in a factory but was thrown out to be replaced with a newer model, your goal is to get back to the factory using scrap metal pieces you find and solving puzzles.

In this game jam we focused mostly on the music, hopefully you enjoyed it!
